text: ask HR: Definition. chop. The art of trying to get a girl to go out wit you...And gettinâ€™ her digits...

and yes, chopping by definition means cutting with a knife or axe (splitting without removing material, whereby sawing removes material). So technically we do not chop. BUT chewbacca will use the term chop shop anyway :slightly_smiling_face: and maybe we can split wood with bare hands someday. chopppp
